page.shortlink: form layout multicondition condition properties condition expression property
page.description: A JavaScript expression that, when evaluates to *[js:true]* displays the controls in the *[ui:[MultiCondition]]* container between condition and the next condition or *[ui:[MultiCondition]]* container end tag.
